meanings.definition: Clothing worn for playing or engaging in physical activities.
meanings.sent1: My son's playwear includes comfortable shorts and t-shirts.
meanings.sent2: Children often have a separate set of playwear for outdoor activities.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to join in the fun by grabbing a piece of playwear in its mouth.
meanings.sent4: Her playwear was like a superhero costume, giving her confidence to conquer the playground.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the playwear made it easy to spot the kids in the park.

meanings.definition: The act of wearing clothing suitable for play or physical activities.
meanings.sent1: Choosing the right playwear is important for a comfortable day at the park.
meanings.sent2: She always encourages her students to dress in playwear for gym class.
meanings.sent3: The playwear fashion show at school was a hit with the students.
meanings.sent4: His playwear transformed him into a soccer star on the field.
meanings.sent5: The playwear competition brought out the creativity of the participants.
